content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to current data but according to a report by the municipality of Maastricht, they aim to be climate-neutral by 2030 and have therefore been increasing their use of renewable energy sources. The report states that they have already made significant progress in reducing CO2 emissions and increasing the use of renewable energy in the city. Projects such as solar panel initiatives and the use of geothermal energy have been implemented to reach this goal. However, it is recommended to check the most recent data to obtain accurate information regarding the increase in renewable energy sources in Maastricht.
